thread.title: Jamie O'Hara and Bianca Gascoigne SPLIT - a day after he called her 'The potential One'
thread.title_full: Jamie O'Hara and Bianca Gascoigne SPLIT - a day after he called her 'The potential One'

author: Emmeline Saunders
title: Jamie O'Hara and Bianca Gascoigne SPLIT - a day after he called her 'The potential One'
text:
Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Jamie O'Hara has dumped Celebrity Big Brother love interest Bianca Gascoigne just a day after he said she had the potential to be The One. 
Following a week of letting his hair down at strip clubs and top hotspots, Jamie has revealed he's not actually into pursuing a romance with Bianca. 
An insider told The Sun: "They are going to remain firm friends but Jamie needs to spend time with his family first and focus on other things in his life. 
"They had a great time in the CBB house but unfortunately it has come to an end." Jamie and Bianca have split (Photo: Channel 5) 
The shock split will only fan rumours that their loved up display in the CBB house was nothing but a showmance â€“ a claim Jamie took exception to when Calum Best mentioned it during a chat with Nicola McLean. 
And despite Jamie saying Bianca was "wifey material" in his exit interview, it looks like he had a change of heart in the days following the CBB final. 
Just yesterday in an interview with OK! magazine, the former footballer revealed that he could see a future with the model. 
"She definitely has that potential [to be The One]," he admitted. "She's an amazing girl. I know she has her situation to sort out on the outside and I need to respect that." Read More Jamie spotted with his fellow housemates at the CBB finale (Photo: FameFlynet) He and Bianca were reunited five days after he was booted out of the show (Photo: FameFlynet)
